00019     ON_BN_CLICKED( IDC_PING_BTN_RESET_CLIENT, OnBnClickedResetClient )

00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 void CPingStatusDlg::DoDataExchange
00053     (
00054     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00055     )
00056 {
00057     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00058 
00059     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_PING_TXT_SERVER_PINGS, mServerPingCount );
00060     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_PING_TXT_SERVER_PING_TS, mServerPingTime );
00061     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_PING_TXT_CLIENT_PINGS, mClientPingCount );
00062     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_PING_TXT_CLIENT_PING_TS, mClientPingTime );
00063 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void CPingStatusDlg::OnBnClickedResetClient()
00086 {
00087     mCom.mClientPingCount = 0;
00088     updateTextFields();
00089 }    /* OnBnClickedResetClient() */
00090 
00091 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 void CPingStatusDlg::OnBnClickedResetServer()
00096 {
00097     mCom.mServerPingCount = 0;
00098     updateTextFields();
00099 }    /* OnBnClickedResetServer() */

00101 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 afx_msg LRESULT CPingStatusDlg::OnPingEvent( WPARAM, LPARAM )
00108 {
00109     updateTextFields();
00110     return 0;
00111 }    /* OnPingEvent() */

00113 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 void CPingStatusDlg::updateTextFields()
00119 {
00120     mClientPingCount.Format( _T(" %d"), mCom.mClientPingCount );
00121     if( mCom.mClientPingCount > 0 )
00122     {
00123         mClientPingTime.Format( mCom.mLastClientPingTime.Format("%I:%M:%S %p") );
00124     }
00125     else
00126     {
00127         mClientPingTime.Format( _T("") );
00128     }
00129 
00130     mServerPingCount.Format( _T(" %d"), mCom.mServerPingCount );
00131     if( mCom.mServerPingCount > 0 )
00132     {
00133         mServerPingTime.Format( mCom.mLastServerPingTime.Format("%I:%M:%S %p") );
00134     }
00135     else
00136     {
00137         mServerPingTime.Format( _T("") );
00138     }
00139     UpdateData( FALSE );
00140 }
00141 
00142 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 void CPingStatusDlg::OnBnClickedSendPing()
00148 {
00149     mCom.sendPing();
00150 }    /* OnBnClickedSendPing() */
